languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидцы{/g} докладывают, что ритуал Леди-Навигатора взволновал {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинных духов{/g} по всему судну. Все не так плохо, однако оценить нанесенный ущерб до окончания ритуала мы не в силах".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидцы{/g} докладывают, что ритуал Леди-Навигатора взволновал {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинных духов{/g} по всему судну. Все не так плохо, однако оценить нанесенный ущерб до окончания ритуала мы не в силах".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseers{/g} report that the Lady Navigator's ritual has agitated {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} all over the vessel. It is no cause for great concern, but we cannot assess the damage until the ritual is over."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидцы{/g} докладывают, что ритуал Леди-Навигатора взволновал {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинных духов{/g} по всему судну. Все не так плохо, однако оценить нанесенный ущерб до окончания ритуала мы не в силах".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}enginseers{/g} report that the Lady Navigator's ritual has agitated {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} all over the vessel. It is no cause for great concern, but we cannot assess the damage until the ritual is over."

"Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}enginseers{/g} report that the Lady Navigator's ritual has agitated {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} all over the vessel. It is no cause for great concern, but we cannot assess the damage until the ritual is over."

"Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}enginseers{/g} report that the Lady Navigator's ritual has agitated {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} all over the vessel. It is no cause for great concern, but we cannot assess the damage until the ritual is over."

"Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}enginseers{/g} report that the Lady Navigator's ritual has agitated {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} all over the vessel. It is no cause for great concern, but we cannot assess the damage until the ritual is over."

languages.text: “舰长大人，{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}引擎先知{/g}们报告说，导航者女士的仪式惹得整艘船上的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}躁动不安。这件事情并不需要过度关注，但在只有等仪式结束之后，我们才能评估损害。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseers{/g} report that the Lady Navigator's ritual has agitated {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} all over the vessel. It is no cause for great concern, but we cannot assess the damage until the ritual is over."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}引擎先知{/g}们报告说，导航者女士的仪式惹得整艘船上的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}躁动不安。这件事情并不需要过度关注，但在只有等仪式结束之后，我们才能评估损害。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}らの報告によると、航宙士の儀式により、船内の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}が扇動されたとのことです。大きな心配はいりませんが、儀式が終わるまでは損害が把握できません」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseers{/g} report that the Lady Navigator's ritual has agitated {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} all over the vessel. It is no cause for great concern, but we cannot assess the damage until the ritual is over."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}らの報告によると、航宙士の儀式により、船内の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}が扇動されたとのことです。大きな心配はいりませんが、儀式が終わるまでは損害が把握できません」
「ロード・キャプテン、{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}らの報告によると、航宙士の儀式により、船内の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}が扇動されたとのことです。大きな心配はいりませんが、儀式が終わるまでは損害が把握できません」

languages.text: "Lord Captain, die {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Maschinenseher{/g} melden, dass das Ritual des Lady Navigators die {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} im gesamten Schiff in Unruhe versetzt hat. Es besteht kein Grund zu größerer Sorge, aber wir können den Schaden erst ermitteln, wenn das Ritual beendet ist."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseers{/g} report that the Lady Navigator's ritual has agitated {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} all over the vessel. It is no cause for great concern, but we cannot assess the damage until the ritual is over."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, die {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Maschinenseher{/g} melden, dass das Ritual des Lady Navigators die {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} im gesamten Schiff in Unruhe versetzt hat. Es besteht kein Grund zu größerer Sorge, aber wir können den Schaden erst ermitteln, wenn das Ritual beendet ist."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugures{/g} rapportent que le rituel de la dame navigatrice a perturbé les {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} de l'ensemble du vaisseau. Il n'y a pas lieu de s'inquiéter outre mesure, mais nous ne pourrons pas évaluer les dégâts tant que le rituel ne sera pas terminé. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseers{/g} report that the Lady Navigator's ritual has agitated {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} all over the vessel. It is no cause for great concern, but we cannot assess the damage until the ritual is over."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugures{/g} rapportent que le rituel de la dame navigatrice a perturbé les {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} de l'ensemble du vaisseau. Il n'y a pas lieu de s'inquiéter outre mesure, mais nous ne pourrons pas évaluer les dégâts tant que le rituel ne sera pas terminé. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, los {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingenieros{/g} informan de que el ritual de la Lady Navegante ha perturbado a los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} de toda la nave. No es motivo de gran preocupación, pero no podremos evaluar los daños hasta que concluya el ritual».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseers{/g} report that the Lady Navigator's ritual has agitated {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} all over the vessel. It is no cause for great concern, but we cannot assess the damage until the ritual is over."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, los {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingenieros{/g} informan de que el ritual de la Lady Navegante ha perturbado a los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} de toda la nave. No es motivo de gran preocupación, pero no podremos evaluar los daños hasta que concluya el ritual».

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Mühedyumlar{/g} Leydi Rotacı'nın ayininin tüm gemideki {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhlarını{/g} kışkırttığını rapor ediyor. Ciddi bir endişeye mahal yok ancak hasar değerlendirmesini ancak ayin tamamlandıktan sonra yapabileceğiz."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseers{/g} report that the Lady Navigator's ritual has agitated {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} all over the vessel. It is no cause for great concern, but we cannot assess the damage until the ritual is over."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}mühedyum{/g}lar Leydi Rotacı'nın ayininin tüm gemideki {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhları{/g}nı kışkırttığını rapor ediyor. Ciddi bir endişeye mahal yok ancak ayin tamamlanmadan hasar tespit yapmamız mümkün değil."
